message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to you, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. My initial offer for the product is $1300000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am proposing an offer of $1150000 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position, and I would like to make a proposal that could work for both of us. My counteroffer for the product is $1250000.
